title: Hero MotoCorp launches Xpulse 200 4V Rally Edition priced at Rs 1.52 lakh
description: The Xpulse 200 4V Rally Edition can be booked on company's online sales platform - eSHOP from July 22, 12pm onwards till July 29, 12pm, Hero MotoCorp said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
